content: अस्मद् {%<ab>pron.</ab>%} [अस्-मदिक् <ls>Uṇ. 1. 136</ls>] A pronominal base from which several cases of the 1st personal pronoun are derived; it is also <ab>abl.</ab> <ab>pl.</ab> of the word. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} The individual soul, the embodied soul; यूयं वयं वयं यूयमित्यासीन्मतिरावयोः . किं जातमधुना येन यूयं यूयं वयं वयं .. <ls>Bh. 3. 65</ls> (quite estranged from each other).
